title: Canada party plane influencer 'idiots' fly home to face music
description: The group of fun-loving travellers have been branded "barbarians" by Prime Minister Justin Trudeau.

description: The FA Cup third round sees Premier League and Championship teams enter and you can follow all the action this weekend on the BBC.

description: Boris Johnson's ex-adviser says drinks were arranged by a "senior No 10 official" in May 2020.

title: Truck spends three days dangling over China cliff
description: The driver is said to have tried to reverse on a narrow mountain road.

description: The president orders the crackdown on protests, saying "20,000 bandits" had attacked the main city.

title: Trippier's £12m move to Newcastle 'not for financial benefits', says Howe

description: Labour accuses Boris Johnson of offering access to ministers in return for financial favours.

description: The annual Consumer Electronics Show (CES) has gone ahead in Las Vegas, despite the pandemic.

description: Australian player Nick Kyrgios says his country's handling of Novak Djokovic's visa dispute has been "really bad" and urged officials to "do better".

description: Jonny Bairstow score a fine century as England's batters show some fight against Australia on day three of the fourth Ashes Test.

title: No address? Give the postie a 57-word description instead
description: An envelope with a 57-word mini-biography rather than a street address finds the right person.
